abstract: The company spent an estimated $300 million on advertising last year, and had not reviewed its ad assignments since 2005. A lot has changed in the economy, and at the bank, since then.

lead_paragraph: The new year is beginning with a bang on Madison Avenue as a big, blue-chip marketer, Bank of America, places in review its advertising account.

headline.main: Bank of America Puts Its Advertising Account in Review
